title: 7 years to fix it
body: You have had 7 years to fix the connection issues with the client yet they still hinder hundred of players. From random lag spikes, to disconnections, to just being unplayable. If you're not going to fix it then could you at least install a ping meter that can judge your connection strength prior to que?

replies.body: You act like riot can magically fix your LAN, ISP and local infrastructure.

Start > Run > cmd > ping <insert IP address here>
